alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; Livingston; Northern Will; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:21AM CDT until November 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts in excess of 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and northeast Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds with gusts up to 65 mph are expected from daybreak to noon. Thereafter, gusts up to 55 will continue through sunset.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; Livingston; Northern Will; Southern Will
